definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions

sentences.english: How did you know I'd be in the tub?
Bath is the best choice for fall and winter milk bath or a rose moisturizing bath.
sentences.chinese: 秋冬泡澡最佳选择是牛奶浴或者是玫瑰保湿浴。

sentences.english: Archimedes had his eureka moment in the bath.
sentences.chinese: 阿基米德在泡澡时灵感迸发。

sentences.english: Take short showers instead of baths.
sentences.chinese: 用短时间的淋浴代替浴缸泡澡。

sentences.english: Israelis bathe in hot springs on the shore of the Dead Sea near Ein Gedi.
sentences.chinese: 人们在死海岸边附近的温泉里泡澡，以色列。

sentences.english: Whoever posed for the Mr. Bubble's box of bubble bath.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都好像在为泡泡先生的泡泡澡盒子摆造型。

sentences.english: Winter swimming, or submerging oneself in freezing water, has religious and cultural roots.
sentences.chinese: 冬泳，或者在冰冻的水里泡澡有着宗教和文化根源。

sentences.english: Used in bath water, it relieves rheumatalgia and has antiseptic action to urinary system.
sentences.chinese: 用来泡澡可纾解风湿痛，对泌尿系统亦有抗菌效果。

sentences.english: Every time you take a bath or shower, you remove germs and viruses from your body.
sentences.chinese: 每次你泡澡或淋浴时，都从身上洗掉了细菌和病毒。

sentences.english: Hot water and long showers or baths remove oils from your skin.
sentences.chinese: 热水和长时间的淋浴或泡澡能祛除你皮肤中的油分。

definition: to soak in a spa or hot spring
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
